channel.title: Posts on Collect thoughts from daily wondering
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Collect thoughts from daily wondering

item.description: This test file has been updated, what a surprise?

Review of the article “The Feedback Fallacy” Recently I read the article The Feedback Fallacy, I was amazed, I’ve thought it for a long time, as I was born and raised in a traditional Asian culture which encourage submission and patriarchy, I have a weak ego and incline to follow others whenever possible. But since I left my hometown and living alone metro cities for years, I found myself became more self-center, independent, and most importantly, happier.
